{{Infobox dungeon |name = Union Cave |image = [[File:Union Cave.png]] |caption = A map of Union Cave. |tokens = 3,000 |location = South of Violet City and the [[Ruins of Alph]], on Route 32. }} '''Union Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 63,600 |- | Boss || 260,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Ratatta * Sandshrew * Zubat * Geodude * Onix * Goldeen * Magikarp * Wooper (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 25% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | [[Item Magnet]] || 25% |}
